# hof mod vendor - with deps
exec hof mod vendor

-- cue.mod/module.cue --
module: "github.com/test/withsolo"
cue: "v0.5.0"

require: {
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/hof": "v0.6.8-mod.1"
}
-- dummy_end --



# hof mod vendor - with deps
exec hof mod vendor

-- cue.mod/module.cue --
module: "github.com/test/withmulti"
cue: "v0.5.0"

require: {
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/hof": "v0.6.8-mod.1"
  "github.com/hofstadter-io/hofmod-cli": "v0.8.0-mod.2"
}

-- dummy_end --


# hof mod vendor - require v0.0.0 - A
exec hof mod vendor

-- cue.mod/module.cue --
module: "github.com/test/mod-v000-a"
cue: "v0.5.0"

require: {
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/hof": "v0.0.0"
}
-- dummy_end --

# hof mod vendor - BUG require v0.0.0 - B
exec hof mod vendor

-- cue.mod/module.cue --
module: "github.com/test/mod-v000-b"
cue: "v0.5.0"

require: {
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/hof": "v0.0.0"
  "github.com/hofstadter-io/hofmod-cli": "v0.0.0"
}

-- dummy_end --
